news.title: Gujarat HC paves way for redevelopment of slum quarters in Khokhra
news.para: The residents had approached the high court against the developer undertaking demolition of 448 housing units in slum quarters and they claimed that their houses were in perfect shape and they did not want any redevelopment.

news.title: Nearly 27% of DDA flats returned since 2014: Housing ministry
news.para: In a written reply, junior housing minister Kaushal Kishore said the DDA has informed the ministry that out of 56,932 flats offered by it since 2014, about 15,500 flats have either been surrendered by the allottees or have remained unsold.

news.title: Records of over three lakh waqf properties digitized: Government
news.para: In a written reply in Rajya Sabha, Union Minister for Minority Affairs Mukhtar Abbas Naqvi said, "So far records of 7,75,172 immovable waqf properties have been registered in Waqf Assets Management System of India (WAMSI) registration module."

news.title: SC refuses urgent hearing of builders' plea for resumption of construction activities in NCR
news.para: ​Taking note of worsening air quality, the bench headed by Chief Justice N V Ramana had reversed the decision of the executive to allow construction activities from November 22 and had re-imposed the ban.

news.title: Realtors buy 1,361-acres land since July 2020 across seven cities: Anarock
news.para: Many developers and entities closed around 45 separate land deals, including outright purchases and joint developments, totaling around 1,757 acres across the top 7 cities between July 2020 and November 2021.

news.title: Can't appear for anti-pollution steps and builders: SC to lawyer
news.para: CJI Ramana said, “On one side, you appear for petitioner and want the pollution to stop. On the other side, you appear for the builders and want construction activities to go on. Let the government take a call on this issue.”

news.title: NCLT allows withdrawal of insolvency proceedings against MGF Developments
news.para: On Tuesday, NCLT had initiated insolvency proceedings against MGF on a application under Section 7 of the IBC Code, 2016 filed by The Vilas Condominium Association consisting of homebuyers having 327 units allotted in the name of members of the association.

news.title: Parsvnath gets 4,750 sq metre-land for Rs 14.8 crore in Greater Noida after dispute settlement
news.para: ​In a tender process held in 2007, the company was allotted over 18,000 square metres of plot on a 90-year lease by the Greater Noida Industrial Development Authority in Uttar Pradesh.

news.title: Sunshine 100 China Holdings defaults on $170 million bond
news.para: Sunshine 100 said in an exchange filing that it was not able to repay the principal and interest of a 10.5% bond due Dec 5, "owing to liquidity issues arising from the adverse impact of a number of factors including the macroeconomic environment and the real estate industry."

news.title: Evergrande moves toward restructuring; state swoops in to contain risk
news.para: Evergrande which is grappling with over $300 billion in liabilities and is at risk of becoming China's biggest ever default, said on Monday that the committee included officials from state entities and would play an important role in "mitigating and eliminating the future risks" of the group.

news.title: Israeli firm to sell HSBC Tower in New York for $855 million
news.para: The Israeli company, which is 63% owned by Discount Investment Corp, said it had also sold property in Israel for 390 million shekels ($123 million).

news.title: HC seeks ED response on bail plea by Ambience group's promoter
news.para: The ED had raided Gehlot, his company Aman Hospitality Private Limited (AHPL), some other firms of the Ambience group, director in the company Dayanand Singh, Mohan Singh Gehlot, and their associates in July last year.

news.title: Hong Kong: New World Development to offer 300 homes at 50% discount to market price
news.para: Once the proposal was approved by the government, New World would build 300 one- to three-bedroom flats ranging in size from 300 to 550 square feet in the New Territories West district.

news.title: Saint-Gobain buys U.S.-based GCP for around $2.3 billion
news.para: "This acquisition is a decisive step in establishing Saint-Gobain's leading position worldwide in construction chemicals with total sales of more than 4 billion euros ($4.51 billion), up from 3 billion euros," Saint-Gobain said in a statement.

news.title: Aparna Enterprises invests Rs 100 crore in its tiles division
news.para: Aparna Enterprises is also aligning their resources to expand their dealer network and their market presence. In FY21 the company had increased their network in India by 23% and this year they plan to further boost it by 30%.
